description: The affected Nexomon can't be swapped for another one. Receives damage each turn equal to 8% of its maximum HP.
The affected Nexomon receives damage each turn equal to 8% of its maximum HP.
The affected Nexomon has a 35% chance of failing when using a skill. If this happens, it receives damage equal to 8% of its maximum HP.
All skills that the affected Nexomon uses are "not effective
The affected Nexomon has a 50% chance of failing when using a skill.
The affected Nexomon receives 30% extra damage from non-elemental attacks.
The affected Nexomon can't use any skills, unless it's a Fire skill (which also removes Freeze). Each turn there is a 30% chance that the Nexomon will thaw.
The affected Nexomon receives damage each turn equal to 12% of its maximum HP.
The affected Nexomon receives damage each turn equal to 15% of its maximum HP, if it's asleep. This effect is cured if the Nexomon is no longer asleep.
The affected Nexomon receives no damage from incoming attacks.
The affected Nexomon receives damage each turn equal to 10% of its maximum HP. The opponent will be healed for the same amount, even if it's not the original cause of this status effect.
The affected Nexomon has a 60% chance of failing when using a skill, if it was using the same skill last turn.
The affected Nexomon has a 30% chance of failing when using a skill.
The affected Nexomon can neither be swapped or escape from the battle.
The affected Nexomon receives damage each turn equal to 10% of its maximum HP.
The affected Nexomon can't inflict status effects.
The affected Nexomon can only use the same skill as last turn, otherwise it loses its turn.
The affected Nexomon restores HP each turn equal to 8% of its maximum HP.
The affected Nexomon can't be healed. Incoming heals are nullified.
The afftected Nexomon can't use any skills or evade attacks.
The affected Nexomon won't drop below 1HP for the duration of this effect.
